name: Sean Lambert: Choose Your Path (Demo)
description:
A game by University Studios, the company that brought you the Sean Lambert franchise...

"Sean Lambert: Choose Your Path" is here! Play as Sean as he undergoes a daring mission with the help of his crew: Big Joe, Skelephilia and Princess. 

Avoid the suspicion, gamble, flirt and steal in this tense narrative of Sean's early criminal career, and decide Sean's fate yourself with unique choice mechanics that impact your story.

Every choice you make matters, so choose wisely!

In the wise words of Skelly: "Don't. Screw. Up."

A University Studios production.
